amendment.description: Amendment sought to make available by this Act (other than an amount required to be made available by a provision of law, amounts made available for U.S. Customs and Border Protection, and amounts made available for U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement) is hereby reduced by 10 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment made available by this Act (other than an amount required to be made available by a provision of law, amounts made available for U.S. Customs and Border Protection, and amounts made available for U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement) is hereby reduced by 10 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rokita amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 312 (Roll no. 402).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rokita amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 312 (Roll no. 402).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Rokita.
